title: CryptoCraftsMan
author: CryptoCraftsMan
content: I will sell a P2P manual, this scheme allows you to earn +40% of your deposit per day, fashionable and more Included in the price: - detailed instructions; - help setting up an account; - support. My telegram: @p2p_admi Escrow +

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoCraftsMan on December 13, 2023, 02:53:59 AMI will sell a P2P manual, this scheme allows you to earn +40% of your deposit per day, fashionable and more Included in the price: - detailed instructions; - help setting up an account; - support. My telegram: @p2p_admi Escrow +Wait, 40% daily from deposit ? It's wild, never seen something before, can you add more information please about it and actually stick some proofs here, maybe you got statistics of this method or logs.Stories like that sounds strange, text and your telegram account is not enough to get some customers in this forum. "Escrow" word are using to get more trust, but in this case it's make no sense.more looks like scam

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: aliveNFT on December 13, 2023, 03:18:40 AMWait, 40% daily from deposit ? It's wild, never seen something before, can you add more information please about it and actually stick some proofs here, maybe you got statistics of this method or logs.I just left negative feedback for the OP precisely so that those of you who have no experience in this are warned. I have seen many "offers" of this type for many years now and I can tell you that a 40% daily return is a scam that only people who do not know mathematics fall for.If you invest as little as $100, with a 40% daily return, reinvesting what you earn each day, at the end of just one month (30 days) you would have $2,420,143.24. You tell me what the fuck the OP is doing here promoting his "system" instead of being on his way to his private island with his yacht full of models and bottles of champagne.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoCraftsMan on December 13, 2023, 02:53:59 AMI will sell a P2P manual, this scheme allows you to earn +40% of your deposit per day, fashionable and more Stop scamming people and go find a better work for yourself. It's not possible to earn +40% of whatever deposit per day and if someone offers such things then surely there's shady part in that. I'm pretty sure that no one will fall into your scam but still I would warn anyone to not deal with you. I highly agree with Poker Player because someone who's going to scam others will put such offers so guys be careful from the OP.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Cool story bro. If you indeed had a way to earn 40% daily you would keep quiet and make as much much as money as possible while you can, instead trying to sell that "method" of others.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on December 13, 2023, 05:37:50 AMCool story bro. If you indeed had a way to earn 40% daily you would keep quiet and make as much much as money as possible while you can, instead trying to sell that "method" of others.Lol,  exactly. This simple thing some fool people can not understand is that if I would have something to earn a guaranteed good amount every day why I make it public? It's nothing but PONZI SCHEME. And this is also normal some greedy people will fall into it.

comments.author: Ziskinberg
comments.body: Sorry mate, for me to earn $1000 a day that is 40% of my deposit? That means I'll have to deposit $2500.. Thanks but no thanks..

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: That's is incredible! Where did you get this idea from? You already have a negative trust, I do not think anyone would be interested to earn with you.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Newbies should be cautious and skeptical when approaching or exploring an intriguing opportunity for earning income. Promises of high returns in a short period with minimal or no effort and too-good-to-be-true offers indicate scams. It is a type of ad that raises red flags. There is no legitimacy to what OP shared here. Please don’t trust this offer blindly.

comments.author: ineedhelpplease
comments.body: Sounds like bullshit. $1,000 a day posted by a non established user with only two posts raises red flags.Also, I'm developing methods that can earn me some passive income or don't require much work, and they will be out to the public for FREE for anyone who requests them. As of now I'm testing them out myself. But when they are completed and if successful.. No one will have to pay a dime or a penny. All I'd want in return is for vouches from those who succeed.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoCraftsMan on December 13, 2023, 02:53:59 AMI will sell a P2P manual, this scheme allows you to earn +40% of your deposit per day, fashionable and more Included in the price: <snip>Oh wow! How much is the price then? Could you tell us? Maybe you can give us more insights  rather than "fashionable" adjectives. I am not a P2P expert (that earns through P2P), so I could not tell if you're trying to scam anyone. So I think you should be be a little bit transparent. Just a bit. The overview. Not the adjectives. I'm still unsure if it's a scam, as I believe there might be legitimate ways to profit from P2P transactions on exchanges.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Well done OP, firstly this is a new account, you've not even engaged properly in the forum to get a good name, neither did you buy a copper membership at least to send images and stuffs to boost your claim. If you are serious to advertise your so called get rich quick scheme, then you should've come out in a more convincing way as an experienced scammer, but here I see a baby, hungry scammer who doesn't even know a bit about good packaging. 40% ROI daily is a lot man, does the money fall from the sky or what?. how do you or the system now make their money if they allow such cash outs?. This forum is full of very experienced people for you to come and pull such a cheap stunt man. I think you need to get something good and reputable doing with your time and life instead of looking for a way to scam others. Its Christmas time, all of you scammers have crawled out of your hibernation to start pulling one fast stunt or the other to get illegal funds for your merriment, I gat one word for you and your likes. You guys will surely be disappointed.

comments.author: steve5946
comments.body: Hahaha, if it was making $1000 per day, I doubt OP will post it. This is scam!

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: OP just registered to make a thread about this, it's not really for us members of Bitcointalk, but more so for those who will search the internet for how to make money out of curiosity since all topics here are going to be indexed definitely, this is another scam attempt, no reasoning coming from OP can change that, all legit money making method can only earn you $20 to $50 and this for every service rendered as they do on Fiverr and other freelance sites.

comments.author: CypherMonk
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoCraftsMan on December 13, 2023, 02:53:59 AMI will sell a P2P manual, this scheme allows you to earn +40% of your deposit per day, fashionable and more Included in the price: - detailed instructions; - help setting up an account; - support. My telegram: @p2p_admi Escrow +Stop looking for people to scam. Get a real job

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: I don't blame scammers that come up with these obvious dubious schemes, I blame those who fall for them. Assuming people are not falling for these cheap scams, they will not have the motivation to continue. Hey, it's Christmas and scammers are on the loose again, don't let greed make you lose what you have... there is no investment that pays 40% per day!

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Odohu on December 14, 2023, 02:02:07 PMI don't blame scammers that come up with these obvious dubious schemes, I blame those who fall for them. Assuming people are not falling for these cheap scams, they will not have the motivation to continue. Hey, it's Christmas and scammers are on the loose again, don't let greed make you lose what you have... there is no investment that pays 40% per day!That is why we should correct, and give these posters negative feedback whenever they post plans or schemes like this because there are so many newbies who still believe that it's possible, we should keep this forum clean, scammers will use popular platforms to scam and Bitcointalk is one popular forum so even if they place the thread in moderated we should report and tag these posters, its good that OP does not know how to moderate his thread so we can drop here and counter his post.I don't think he can defend all these allegations because it's true that OP is a scammer.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Well done Charles-Tim and Poker player for tagging Op. Atleast the red flag on Op's profile will make it more obvious that he is a scammer or he is intending to scam. 40% profit monthly is likely a scam, let alone 40% daily. It is Bitcoin that can conveniently give you 40% return monthly. Besides, it is just a newbie account posting.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Selling a manual that no one is sure how legit it could be or how deceiving it can be. If you are making claims about this, you should have very tangible evidence, like people who are already in this f**king system and making 40% of their deposit every day. Although there is nothing that seems very impossible for scamers to do this day, you can actually do some forgery and make another claim that it's your investors that have made such a profit in the past.Honestly, I am very skeptical about what you say here; there is no p2p system that can offer someone this amount of daily profit. Guys, be wise and don't ingage, so that you don't get scammed. As for OP, you can say something that is more convincing.
